summary.what: Regenerate example artifacts from richer ledger data
summary.why: Old examples were from 30 backfilled entries with shallow why fields — 55 real entries with notes produce dramatically better decision-log and sprint-report output
summary.how: Generated raw drafts via timbers draft, processed the prompt+entries directly (claude -p cannot nest), wrote all 5 site examples. Decision log now has 6 genuine ADRs including notes-enriched registry-vs-switch deliberation.

notes: The decision-log improvement is the strongest showcase. Old version had 9 ADRs but most were from backfilled entries with thin why fields. New version has 6 ADRs but every one has genuine fork-in-the-road context. ADR-4 (registry pattern) includes quoted notes from the entry — first example of notes enriching template output.
